title: ED Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: Easy going and fair. Staff were friendly. On time. Asked fair and relevant questions. It was a panelist interview with different members of the staff. Good conversations with everyone at the table.
Interview Questions: How would you interact with a patient who does not speak your language?

title: Enviromental Sevices Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: Very thorough process, straight forward, and easy process. The interviewer asked questions on past experiences and how you can help within the environment of the job. Enjoyed how simple it was to find what kind of jobs were offered and the process.
Interview Questions: How you can be useful working at the company, experiences with past jobs, what qualities do you have.

title: Patient Transporter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: Group interview, basic interview questions what are your strengths and what are your weaknesses. A group panel of about 4 to 6 people and they all ask what do you do outside of work and what are your hobbies Emphasize patient care or transport and let them know that you were not afraid of blood, traumas, pandemics or anything in a hospital setting
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: The phone call then an in-person interview, asked questions about expanding ideas, and the in-person is more about why would you want the job and how would you benefit them.
Interview Questions: Give an example of a time you worked as a leader in a group setting?

title: RN, ER Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: Asked different questions by director and managers. Assess how you deal with emergent situations. Why you want to work there.  Do you prefers nights or days .  Explain process of orientation for new nurses.
Interview Questions: Was I willing to work night shift first

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: My interview was a Panel Interview with Manager and multiple staff( including charge nurse, clinical educator, bedside nurses). the offer was received a few days later after background checks was performed.
Interview Questions: Questions regarding my experience, skills, case scenario...

title: Environmental Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: Only 3 questions, very easy going interview.  Very welcoming work environment. Interviewer answered all the questions I had and gave me a lot of information about kaweah health.  Not awkward all over a good experience.
Interview Questions: What’s one thing you did to help out that wasn’t apart of your job?

title: Front Desk Reciptionist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: Efficient, professional, it was more like a conversation than just having questions fired at you. They asked what I was looking for as far as weekly hours,  shift I would be available for. Shifts I would be unwilling to work.
Interview Questions: What qualities/ skills do you have, that would make you the best candidate for the position?

title: Psychiatric Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: very easy interviewers are very knowledge able, really cared about what i was going to bring to the job. very helpful ansering all my questions. loved the staff and management. felt very safe in this enviorment
Interview Questions: how to perform cpr and safety measures

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: Laid back, nurse educator and one manager was present. Asked generic questions and gave a run down of the unit. Asked about current experience, background, expectations of the role. asked how I would deal with stress on the job, handle a difficult coworker, and how I manage my time.
Interview Questions: If two are your coworkers are clashing, and the other asks you for your opinion how do you respond?

title: RN NICU Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: Applied on the career page and received a call a week later. Interview was with the manager and assistant manager. Very personable in person interview - they asked about my experience, how I work in a team, how you deal with stress,  future goals, why KDHCD  etc.
Interview Questions: Give an example when you gave exceptional patient care

title: RN-ED Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Fresno, CA) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: On person with the director of Emergency unit. Then a tour of the emergency department. And the day after you will receive or not an offer. And you will have to fill documents online if you accept the contingent letter.
Interview Questions: Introduction : Tell me about yourself

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: I was asked about myself and experience. They also asked about how I deal with conflict, how I prioritize patient care, what would I do if I wasn't familiar with a particular skill or procedure. It wasn't a bad experience.
Interview Questions: Describe a time you had a conflict with another employee. What did you do and what was the outcome?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Very rude and really harped on WHY would i move to Visalia rather than who i was as a candidate. No questions about nursing. Very hard to get answers to questions about the hospital and the role.
Interview Questions: Why would you move to Vislia?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: Interview was via FaceTime with the unit manager. It lasted about 30 minutes. She was very nice and made me feel very comfortable and relaxed while interviewing. She  told me about the unit, asked normal behavioral  interview questions and one clinical question, then allowed me to ask questions.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time when the pathophysiology you learned in school came together with a patients diagnosis.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed with the manager and the assistant manager over a FaceTime call. Before that, I had a phone screen and was asked if I was interested for an interview. It was
Interview Questions: typical behavioral questions with a few clinical scenarios

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was a panel interview with assistant nurse manager, charge nurse, and nurse educator. Mostly your standard behavioral questions. They called me back in a couple hours with a job offer.
Interview Questions: If you were an animal, which animal would you be?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: Applied online through KDHCD website. Reached out to recruiter to express interest. Managers reached out via phone and engaged in brief (~10-15 min) phone screening calls. Scheduled several in-person interviews (~1 hr conversation) with main manager and assistant manager (each interview included 2-3 KDHCD staff). Offers came quickly thereafter (<48 hrs). Overall excellent, straightforward, efficient, and transparent interview process.
Interview Questions: Clinical scenarios were presented in several interviews to allow interviewers to assess applicants clinical reasoning skills. The scenarios given were very fair.

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with department mananger openings  and Rn in charged of hiring. They make you feel secure and not nervous.  They offer you a job by the next day if you fit.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself?
Why do you want to work here?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: Very knowledgeable staff during interview process everyone was great and friendly. Be prepared and review. Be confident and courteous. Be on time and do not be nervous. Review systems and patho and medications. Study hard and remember that anything in life that if it’s meant to be then it is meant to be.
Interview Questions: Experience

title: Per Diem Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: Very quick, over the phone. I went through a process of taking a few exams for Spanish competency and was offered the job. The only negative is that the process of the entire hiring and background checks took nearly two months.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this position?

title: Floater Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions:
straight forward and as to be expected for and hospital position,
Interview lasted about 10 to 20 minutes. 
The hiring process for me took about 3 weeks to get into orientation
Interview Questions: What would you do if someone was gossiping to you

title: Certified Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions: It was fast and some tricky questions . Overall they were really sweet . They introduce themselves they ask why the hospital and Just basic questions it’s just overwhelming when there’s a lot staring at you
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: Very relaxing, interviewer was nice. I felt welcomed. Toured the unit. I thought it was strange after receiving the call from the manager. The manager kept suggesting that new nurses should get some experience on a Medsurg floor before branching out to a specialty. Not sure why I received a call from the manager because my resume clearly states new grad nurse but still called and interview me to suggest starting on a Medsurg unit first :(
Interview Questions: Why this unit? Why this hospital?

title: LVN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: i had applied online. i received a call for an interview a week later. i interviewed with a 3-person panel. i was called back in 2 days that i did not get the job. fast process, i appreciated the phone call letting me know, so i wouldn't be in limbo waiting.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Rehab Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions: I had to do a phone interview then meet face to face interview with my supervisor. It was more like  a conversation about my life and what led me to this position now, very casual but she did ask some questions about communication styles and what I deemed important.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Registered Dietitian Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the dietitian position online. The manager called me for a phone interview unexpectedly. She asked me a few questions. After the questions, she told me that they will have Skype interview and in-person interview if I will be further considered.
Interview Questions: Is there an area area that you want to work within as being a dietitian?

title: Housekeeping Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: the interview process went well since i started as a temp than they hired me from the temp agency to keep me on and help fill the quotes in cleaning rooms.
Interview Questions: how i would i benefit the company

title: Manager, Volunteer Services Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions: I went through a panel interview process which was very fair and worked well. I had an opportunity to learn the expectations through many different eyes and perspectives which helped me to form my opinion of the position.
Interview Questions: Why did I think I was qualified for this position.

title: Per Diem Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and received a call from HR a few weeks later. Went to HR to take a test and passed so my info was given to my (now) manager. Had an interview with the department and discussed skills and average interview questions and was hired shortly after.
Interview Questions: Do you know what you'll be doing in this position?

title: Food Service Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health
Interview Descriptions:
Applied online for a position. Kept checking the status online, since you can't call (HR doesn't like it IMAGINE THAT).....1 weeks passed and the status said I was being considered for the position, 2 days after that I was called for an interview. Showed up 10 minutes early and met with the manager. First red flag was there were no interview questions, he just summarized my resume and application. After that, he  came out with the truth.....there were no positions available. WHY DID YOU NOT THINK TO CONTACT ME AND CANCEL THEN?!?!?! His explanation was that HR saw there were open times that no workers were scheduled so they put out a posting....
STILL that is no excuse! Bad or lack of communication between departments shows a lot about a company!
Interview Questions: Basically, there were none! A very simple, laid back meeting. NOT an interview in my opinion.

title: Recreation Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: Initial communication was with the director of the mental health hospital, the department I applied for. I then set up a phone interview with the director a few days later. At the beginning of the process there were four applicants for the position. The director followed up the very next day to schedule a skype interview the following week with seven executives from different departments. 3-4 days later the company offered to fly me out for a site-interview and covered all travel expenses. The site interview consisted of a panel interview with 7 department heads. Some were the same as the skype interview, but there were a few I had not met yet. It was very casual. They really wanted to get to know me as a person more. I then took a tour of the hospital, and had a lunch interview with the director and a potential co-worker.
Interview Questions: What treatment interventions would you suggest for our clients?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at Kaweah Health (Visalia, CA) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with three managers . had list of questions each, basic interview questions including strengths, weaknesses, why did I choose Nursing as a career, etc Very normal panel interview set up
Interview Questions: Basic strengths, weaknesses, how would coworkers describe you
